DOC.brief_summary: Test feasibility perform worksite screening Hypertension , Diabetes Hyperlipidemia six month
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Testing Feasibility Health Screening Farm Site
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator visit farmer worksite monthly six month perform cardiovascular risk factor screen : blood pressure , blood glucose , glycosylated hemoglobin cholesterol . At end intervention , investigator test feasibility approach among specific population questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old agricultural worker farm owner
